pageProduct.name: Thompson's Ultra Liver Detox Liquid 300ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Ultra Liver Detox helps support healthy liver and digestive function.

Thompson's Ultra Liver Detox is a liver tonic that helps support healthy liver function, liver detoxification and natural liver regeneration. It also supports healthy digestive function and helps relieve digestive disturbances and upper gastrointestinal discomfort such as flatulence and may help to reduce nausea and vomiting.

Size: 300mL

Oil-Free?: Yes

Shelf Life in Days: 1095

KEY FEATURES

• Helps support healthy liver function, liver detoxification and natural liver regeneration.
• Supports healthy digestive function.
• Helps relieve digestive disturbances and upper gastrointestinal discomfort such as flatulence.
• May help to reduce hteh symptoms of nausea and vomiting.
• Liver tonic.
• Vegan and vegetarian frienldy.

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each 10mL contains: Herbal extract equiv. to dry:
Silybum marianum (Milk Thistle) fruit 12g (12000mg)
equiv. Flavanolignans calculated as Silybin 137.1mg
Curcuma longa (Turmeric) rhizome 47.5mg
equiv. Curcuminoids 2mg
Perilla frutescens (Perilla) leaf 2.5mg
Cinnamomum verum (Cinnamon) stem bark 100mg
Herbal extract equiv. to fresh:
Cynara Scolymus (Globe Artichoke) leaf2g (2000mg)

Contains: Contains: Sorbates, 5mg Potassium sorbate/mL, trace amounts of sulfites and 2.7g glycerin/maximum daily dose.

Directions

Store below 25°C in a dry place. Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Storage Temperature: below 25°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
